name: Accento Xerjoff Velvet Collection
description:
Eau de Parfum - 100ML
Accento by Xerjoff is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Accento was launched in 2019. Accento was created by Christian Carbonnel and Laura Santander. Top notes are Hyacinth and Pineapple; middle notes are iris, Jasmine and Pink Pepper; base notes are Musk, Vetiver, Vanilla, Amber and Patchouli.

name: Jean Paul Gaultier Scandal A Paris
description:
Eau de Toilette - 80ML
Jean Paul Gaultier Scandal A Paris Eau de Toilette is a chypre floral fragrance that feels addictive and radiant with a sweet presence.
Jean Paul Gaultier Scandal A Paris Eau de Toilette is a radiant as well as luminous new version of the first Scandal by Jean Paul Gaultier. Featuring a fruity opening note of pear, the fragrance then develops to a heart of the floral and elegant jasmine. The perfume finishes with a sweet note of honey, which instantly transforms the scent into a beautiful addiction. A new Scandal A Paris leaves a trail of fearlessness as well as countless rumors as you move.
A Scandal in a bottle: an outrageously radiant essence that reveals light pink through a clear glass. This iconic image perfectly anticipates the unforgettable scent you're about to try!
Notes

Top notes: pear;
Heart notes: jasmine;
Base notes: honey.

name: Angels' Share By Kilian
description:
Eau de Parfum - 50ML
Angels' Share by By Kilian is a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Angels' Sharewas launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Benoist Lapouza. Top note is Cognac; middle notes are Cinnamon, Tonka Bean and Oak; base notes are Praline, Vanilla and Sandalwood.

name: Diptyque 34 Tentre-Quatre Boulevard Saint Germain
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
34 boulevard Saint Germain by Diptyque is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. 34 boulevard Saint Germain was launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Pescheux. Top notes are Clove, Cinnamon, Black Currant, Cardamom, Fig Leaf, Pink Pepper, Green Notes and Citruses; middle notes are Geranium, Tuberose, iris, Rose and Violet; base notes are Resin, Woodsy Notes and Eucalyptus.

name: Kenzo World Eau de Parfum Intense
description:
Eau de Parfum Intense - 75ML
KENZO has revisited its floral bouquet through a powerful gourmand twist.
A bold association between the addictive velvety black plum, the radiant peony and jasmine, the gourmand vanilla. 
A fragrance to dare to be yourself. Reveal your inner power.

name: L'Envol de Cartier Eau de Toilette
description:
80ML Eau de Toilette
L'Envol Eau de Toilette by Cartier is a Woody fragrance for men. L'Envol Eau de Toilette was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Mathilde Laurent. Top notes are Citruses and Artemisia; middle note is Honey; base notes are Musk and Guaiac Wood.

name: Rose Alexandrie Giorgio Armani Prive
description:
100ml Eau de Toilette
This fragrance is inspired by the subtle intermingling of fountain waters and the scent of roses from the Alexandrian garden, fresh, moist; then warmed by the sun’s rays.
The Rose Alexandrie luxury perfume showcases the Rose of May, in the spirit of the gardens of Alexandria. Drawing on the grace and distinction of the world’s most beloved flower, this damask rose perfume is prized for its highly complex alchemy, lending itself to an infinite number of compositions. Heady and intense, both soft and potent, this is a floral fragrance unlike any other

name: SOLEIL BLANC 100ML by TOM FORD
description:
Eau de Parfum 100ml
Eau de Soleil Blanc by Tom Ford is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Eau de Soleil Blanc was launched in 2018. Top notes are Bitter Orange, Neroli, Pistachio, Bergamot, Citron, Petitgrain, Cardamom, Pink Pepper and Caraway; middle notes are Tuberose, Tunisian Orange Blossom, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine and Galbanum; base notes are Coconut, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Amber and Benzoin.

name: PASSAGE D'ENFER By Olivia Giacobetti L'Artisan Parfumeur
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
Passage d’Enfer pays homage to the Parisian location of L’Artisan Parfumeur’s office in the 1970s. It conjures up images of chilled cathedral walls and echoes of rituals and incantations. Translucent lily and white musk sweeten the balsamic smoke of incense. Passage d’Enfer is also a wicked play on words, the symbolic “Hells passage”, a moment caught between two worlds. The name may be dark and unsettling, but the scent itself is tranquil and contemplative. 
Passage d’Enfer is a subtle elixir based on incense essence, an exquisite, woody and aromatic raw material. 
Pure, airy and all-consuming, it attracts and seduces, conjuring up dream-like, voluptuous, poetic and sensual moments of pleasure.

name: Versace Atelier Eclat De Rose
description:
100ml Eau de Parfum
A hint of elegance, fragility, irreverence, and candour, Eclat De Rose  by Versace perfume for women is a new floral amber oriental fragrance that combines velvety notes of Moroccan rose centifolia at the top with a luscious heart of cashmere wood, all of which are supported by a heady ambrox base. The perfume boasts a hand-made clear glass bottle enriched with the name of the fragrance written in a gold tone.

Fragrance Notes: Moroccan rose, ambroxan, amber, incense, cashmere wood, tobacco, musk

name: PENHALIGON'S HALFETI LEATHER
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
The British house Penhaligon’s unveiled on May 8th, 2020, a new chapter in its Trade Routes Collection; the perfume Halfeti Leather. It is announced as a dark creation in oriental tones, built around a woody and spicy rose. A variation of the original Halfeti fragrance from 2015, enriched with spicy, woody and leathery notes.

name: Jo Malone English Pear & Freesia Scented Body Powder
description: Scent your skin with a pearlescent powder, infused with English Pear &amp; Freesia. Formulated with skin conditioning ingredients and light reflecting pearls, it leaves skin feeling silky smooth and with a subtle sheen. A new way of wearing our mellow fragrance, the Scented Body Powder is encased in a sleek mirrored compact and presented in a Jo Malone London pouch with a kabuki brush for application. Perfectly sized for on-the-go touch-ups this party season.

name: 212 VIP Black Red (Limited Edition)
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
VIP Black Red by Carolina Herrera is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. VIP Black Red was launched in 2020. Top notes are Allspice, Cardamom and Ginger; middle note is Absinthe; base notes are Leather and Guaiac Wood.

name: Tiffany & Love Eau de Parfum for Her
description:
90ml Eau de Parfum

A tribute to modern love, Tiffany &amp; Love fragrances share a common hero, blue sequoia. This vibrant woody note unifies the two scents, honoring the many ways love brings two people together. Created by renowned perfumers Honorine Blanc and Marie Salamagne, Tiffany &amp; Love Eau de Parfum for Her is a floral, woody scent. The fragrance opens with a burst of bright and sparkling top notes, beginning with blue basil–a botanical ingredient developed exclusively for Tiffany–paired with grapefruit for an aromatic crispness. The sweet floral bouquet of neroli is at the heart of the fragrance, with a woody blend of blue sequoia. Vetiver and cedarwood are at the base, creating a faceted and feminine scent. Personalize this bottle with custom engraving to make it the perfect gift.


Top notes: Blue basil, blackcurrant, grapefruit


Middle notes: Neroli, jasmine, tuberose flower


Base notes: Blue sequoia, vetiver, cedarwood

name: TOBACCO VANILLE 100ML by TOM FORD
description:
Eau de Parfum 100ml
A luxurious and warming fragrance that highlights a heady modern fusion between sweet, sensual vanilla and spicy tobacco accord. With a rich scent that paints the marvel of an English Gentleman's club, this fragrance opens into a medley of tobacco and spicy notes. The heart samples a deep vanilla chord surrounded in tonka bean, tobacco blossom and bitter cacao. Finishing the scent is a final layer of woods and dried fruits.

description:
100ml - Eau de Parfum
Poison Girl by Christian Dior is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. Poison Girl was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Francois Demachy. Top notes are Bitter Orange and Lemon; middle notes are Damask Rose, Grasse Rose and Orange Blossom; base notes are Vanilla, Almond, Tonka Bean, Tolu Balsam, Sandalwood, Heliotrope and Cashmeran.

name: Brilliantly British Penhaligon's - Limited Edition
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
The house of Penhaligon’s celebrates 150 years of its “fragrant stories” and invites you to “browse the library” and “stick your nose in an exciting new chapter.” On the occasion of this jubilee anniversary, a new edition called Brilliantly British is presented, in line with the heritage of the brand.
Penhaligon’s Brilliantly British is announced as a “dapper scent indeed,” combining the notes of lavender and toffee caramel. “As if swaying lavender had been plucked from a sleepy English garden, and frozen on the spot. Thoroughly traditional. Uncommonly refreshing.”

name: CALIFORNIA DREAM by LOUIS VUITTON
description:
100ml Eau de Parfum
California Dream, with warm, citrusy and oriental notes, captures the sunset in a bottle, the sky above LA and the mood of this city. It contains notes of mandarin, pear, musk as well as ambrette seed and benzoin. The perfumer's idea was to contrast the explosive freshness with softer notes, as warmth surrounding cool tones.
California Dream is a shared / unisex perfume by Louis Vuitton. The scent was launched in 2020 and the fragrance was created by perfumer Jacques Cavallier Belletrud


California Dream fragrance notes


Top Notes

Heart Notes

Base notes

name: Musc Shamal Giorgio Armani Prive
description:
100ml Eau de Parfum Intense
Musc Shamal is inspired by an intense enveloping oriental wind, a true olfactory embodiment of this radiant breeze. The fragrance is Giorgio Armani's interpretation of the breath of the desert, dancing across the endless sand dunes of Arabia.
NOTES:A plethora of Musks combined with aerial notes create a vaporous and captivating facet. An opulent rose offers floral and lightening notes while ambery woods and cedarwood bring a warm and vibrant sensuality intensified by vanilla. The fragrance is an aura of light from which comes a powerful and enveloping sensuality.

name: Gucci The Alchemist’s Garden: Tears of Iris
description:
Eau de Parfum 100ML

"Tears of Iris" eau de Parfum
One of the most ancient ingredients in perfumery, the Iris flower emits a sensual, woody scent blended with Sandalwood, Angelica Seeds and Musks.
Accentuate this fragrance by layering it with perfumed oils and acque profumate from the collection to create a personalized blend.
Inspired by the first perfumery containers displayed on the wooden shelves of antique apothecaries, the fragrance is enclosed in a precious, white lacquered glass bottle with a porcelain effect, adorned with gold accents.
Among the animals populating the House's narrative universe, the image of an owl decorates the bottle, with luminous eyes reminiscent of an Iris.

70ml - Extrait de Parfum

name: LE LABO SANTAL 33
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum

A perfume that touches the sensual universality of this icon, that would intoxicate a man as much as a woman. It introduces the brand's use of cardamom, iris, violet and ambrox, which crackle in the formula and bring to this smoking wood alloy—Australian sandalwood, papyrus, cedarwood—some spicy, leathery, musky notes and gives this parfum its unisex signature and addictive comfort. Here is, in a few words, what Santal 33 is: An open fire. The soft drift of smoke. Where sensuality rises after the light has gone.
Style: Rich, woody.
Notes:
- Top: violet accord, cardamom.
- Middle: iris, ambrox.
- Base: cedarwood, leather, sandalwood.

name: Fleur Musc FLORALE by Narciso Rodriguez
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
Fragrance Fleur Musc Florale perfume for Women by Narciso Rodriguez was released in 2020. What does Fleur Musc Florale smell like? Well it is an aroma highlighted by a bouquet of fragrant musky, sweet and woody scented tones that will bring a sensual, warm and uplifting perfumed sensation. Examining it closer once applied you will notice a lingering quality of softer fragranced powdery, balsamic and rose hints that hide an essence of romantic, comforting and cozy feelings.

name: Jo Malone London Wild Bluebell Scent Surround™ Diffuser
description:
Size 165ml
About Jo Malone London Wild Bluebell Scent Surround Diffuser
Fill your room with the scent of vibrant sapphire blooms in a shaded woodland. The delicate sweetness of dewy bluebells suffused with lily of the valley, eglantine, and a luscious twist of persimmon. Delicate, dewy, and mesmerising.
Why It’s Special

Create a fragrant scene in your home with the dewy, delicate scent of wild bluebells
Place on your bedside table or dresser to encourage a relaxing mood
Jo Malone London diffusers add continuous scent to any space for 4-5 months
Genderless

How to Use
Twist off the cap. Remove the black seal from the metal collar and replace the collar. Gently tap the reeds on a hard surface and then dip them into the oil. The greater number of reeds used, the more intense the scent. Allow 24-36 hours for the fragrance to diffuse fully. Enjoy your diffuser for up to 4-5 months.

name: CHLOE Atelier Des Fleurs Neroli
description:
50ml Eau de Parfum
Chloe Neroli Perfume by Chloe, Debuting in 2019, Chloe Neroli is a citrusy floral women’s fragrance with added aromatic and spicy accords. Crafted by accomplished perfumer Sidonie Lancesseur, this scent features a single note of neroli from blossoms of the bitter orange tree. 
Although it often stars alongside other fragrance notes in a wide range of scents, neroli by itself gives off a light, honeyed, aromatic and slightly bitter aroma. It can be worn alone or paired with Verbena, Lavanda or Magnolia Alba, other single-note fragrances from the same brand.

name: CHANEL No 5 100ML
description:
100ml - Eau de Parfum
About No. 5

What can be said that hasn't been said already? A timeless classic that still is a number one seller over 80 years after its launch in 1921.
Created by Earnest Beaux, No.5 was the first perfume ever created using such a large quantity of aldehydes, which give the fragrance its sparkle. Legend has it that Beaux presented Chanel with ten fragrances to choose from. (Or so the story goes...) Chanel chose perfume number five, hence the name.

name: CHANCE Eau de Parfum by CHANEL
description:
100ml - Eau de Parfum
Unexpected, sparkling and romantic.
Allow yourself to be swept up in the whirlwind of CHANCE. Similar to the Eau de Toilette, the Eau de Parfum is an Unexpected Floral, created by Jacques Polge like a marvelous constellation.
An unpredictable balance that continually surprises. A constellation of scents, warmed up by Absolute of Vanilla, where Absolute of Exotic Jasmine and Iris are more pronounced. A mysterious alchemy accentuated by the intensity of the White Musk note.Not quite the same, yet not completely different either… With the Eau de Parfum, CHANCE becomes rounder, more generous and more enveloping…like new love. As if to echo its warmer character, the Eau de Parfum fragrance has a beautiful amber-colored shade, while its bottle is adorned with a few touches of gold: gold replaces silver for the letters of the word CHANCE and on the neck of the bottle, and a delicate line of gold underlines the edges of the folding carton. The cap is made in silvery metal.

name: MUCH ADO ABOUT THE DUKE by PENHALIGON’S
description:
75 ML Eau de Parfum
The handsome young Duke’s peppery rose fragrance sets hearts aflutter – but not the ones you might think. His wife, the most coveted girl in London, seems not to interest him at all. Fancy that.
The perfume dedicated to this historical character has a dual sound. They have a charismatic scent of finely crafted leather, flavored with pine-alcoholic notes of gin and energetic sparks of black pepper, unexpectedly combined with a silky-spicy, iridescent rose scent, creating an unexpected and original aromatic effect.

name: CREED AVENTUS - 100ml (NO BOX)
description:
100ml - Eau de Parfum Without Box.
About Aventus


The exceptional Aventus was inspired by the dramatic life of a historic emperor, celebrating strength, power and success. Introduced in 2010 and crafted by the deft hand of Sixth Generation Master Perfumer Olivier Creed in collaboration with his son Erwin, this scent has grown to become the best-selling fragrance in the history of the brand. Olivier created its iconic name derived from a ("from") ventus ("the wind"), illustrating the Aventus man as destined to live a driven life, ever galloping with the wind at his back toward success. Aventus is a sophisticated blend for individuals who savor a life well-lived.

description:

Mon Paris Love Edition Yves Saint Laurent - What experts say:




Fragrance Mon Paris Love Edition perfume for Women by Yves Saint Laurent was released in 2018. Who Is It Best For? Well it is an aroma highlighted by a bouquet of fragrant fruity, woody and fresh scented tones that will bring a sensual, calming and deep perfumed sensation. Examining it closer once applied you will notice a lingering quality of softer fragranced green, white flowers and musky hints that hide an essence of light, romantic and natural feelings.

name: YSL Black Opium 30ML
description:
30ml Eau de Parfum
The original Eau de Parfum. Addictive and energising. A captivating floral gourmand scent, twisted with an overdose of black coffee, for a shot of adrenaline. Energy, sensuality, coupled with that unique YSL edge. The signature black coffee accord is paired with sensual vanilla, enriched by the softness of white flowers and orange blossom, against a base of patchouli and comforting white musk. A daring contrast of light and dark, for a women’s fragrance that bewitches with its trail.
Fragrance Notes:Top: Pear Accord &amp; Mandarin EssenceHeart: Vanilla, Orange Blossom &amp; White FlowersBase: Black Coffee Accord, Cedarwood Essence, White Musk &amp; Patchouli

About L'Homme Idéal

Guerlain say:

The ideal man is a myth. His fragrance, a reality. Guerlain decodes men’s aspirations and creates for them a concentrate of ideal. The ideal fragrance? Smart, handsome, strong. Three adjectives, three accords for this fresh woody fragrance that will trigger your full potential.

The fragrance was launched in 2014, and created by perfumer Thierry Wasser

name: CHLOE Atelier Des Fleurs Rosa Damascena
description:
50ml Eau de Parfum
Rosa Damascena is a perfume created by Amandine Clerc-Marie as a lightly spiced, crisp and fresh floral rose scent, inspired by the memories of her childhood. She also created Herba Mimosa, a powdery green floral scent that evokes mimosa fields in Grasse.

name: CHLOE Atelier des Fleurs Magnolia Alba
description:
50ml Eau de Parfum
Nature is a precious source of fragrant flowers and aromatic leaves. Drawing on this wide variety of natural bouquets, the House of Chloé has collaborated with renowned perfumers to create the Atelier des Fleurs line. This prestigious collection comprises nine perfumes for women, each with a unique signature rooted in the perfumer’s memory. The fragrances are designed to work in harmony in endless combinations.
Louise Turner transcribed the plump and slightly lemony notes of Magnolia blossoms from her native England. She created a smooth Eau de Parfum, unveiling the fresh, almost creamy scent of Magnolia Petals.

name: Bvlgari Omnia Crystalline Candy Limited Edition
description:
65ml Eau de Toilette
Omnia Crystalline by Bvlgari is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women. Omnia Crystalline was launched in 2005. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Bamboo and Pear; middle notes are Lotus, Tea and Cassia; base notes are Musk, Guaiac Wood and Oakmoss.

name: Bvlgari Omnia Coral Candy Shop Edition
description:
65ml Eau de Toilette
Inspired by the shimmering hues of precious red coral, Omnia Coral is a radiant floral-fruity Eau de Toilette of tropical hibiscus and juicy pomegranate, reminiscent of summer, the sun, resplendent nature and far-off oceans. A FRUITY FLORAL Top Notes: Bergamot and Goji Berries Heart Notes: Hibiscus Flower and Water Lily Base Notes: Pomegranate and Cedar Wood

name: Lancome Idole L’Intense
description:
75ml Eau de Parfum Spray
Lancome Idôle Intense Eau de Parfum, the new intense version of the best selling Idôle Le Parfum. Idôle L’Intense is a fragrance with a stronger-than-ever addictive clean accord at its core, and a flamboyant Floral heart wrapped in a vibrant chypre accord and a sensual vanilla. A radiant and flamboyant rose and a kaleidoscope of jasmine, making it the best perfume for a glowier sensation on the skin. 
The beautiful thin bottle again fuses naturally with the hand and is available in 75ml eau de parfum spray.

description:
100ml Eau de Toilette
Gardénia Antigua by Giorgio Armani is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Gardénia Antigua was launched in 2020. Top notes are Neroli, Mandarin Orange and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Gardenia, Ylang-Ylang and Jasmine; base notes are White Musk, Ambergris and Patchouli.

name: Versace Atelier Cedrat De Diamante
description:
100ml Eau de Parfum Spray
Fresh, more efflorescent than traditional citrus aromas, Cedrat De Diamante by Versace perfume for men is a new citrusy woody oriental fragrance inspired by the Mediterranean, it boasts the zest of Italian lemon and natural woods.

The luxury fragrances embodies the Atelier Versace absolute dedication to excellence, encompassing a studious approach to exceptional quality components, innovative techniques and hand-craftsmanship. The perfume boasts a hand-made clear glass bottle enriched with the name of the fragrance written in a gold tone. 

Fragrance Notes: Italian lemon, pink grapefruit, cedar, vetiver

name: Versace Atelier Jasmin Au Soleil
description:
100ml Eau de Parfum Spray
Sensual, light, velvety scent, Jasmin Au Soleil by Versace perfume for men is a new aromatic woody fragrance that highlights jasmine flowers from India complemented by beeswax from France, containing balsamic and honey notes with hints of hay and tobacco, and  paired with fresh lemon and cedarwood notes. The perfume boasts a hand-made clear glass bottle enriched with the name of the fragrance written in a gold tone. 

 Fragrance Notes: Indian jasmine flowers, beeswax, tobacco, cedarwood, lemon, hay

name: Tom Ford Private Blend Tobacco Vanille Candle
description: Tom Ford's affection for London inspired this scent, reminiscent of an English gentlemen's club, redolent with spice. He reinvents a classic fragrance genre by adding creamy tonka bean, vanilla, cocoa, dry fruit accords and sweet wood sap for a modern, opulent, and almost heady impression that's all man, unless worn by a woman. 21 oz/40 hr burn time. Please remove protective cover before burning.

name: Tom Ford Private Blend Oud Wood Candle
description: Oud wood is one of the most rare, precious and expensive ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal. Exotic rose wood and cardamom give way to a smoky blend of rare oud wood, sandalwood and vetiver. Tonka bean and amber add warmth and sensuality.Immerse yourself in the world of Tom Ford with artfully crafted Private Blend Candles designed to scent and style your home.

name: Tom Ford Private Blend Soleil Blanc Candle
description:
Remote private islands where summer lasts all year and one day seamlessly blends into the next inspire Soleil Blanc, an addictive solar floral amber alivewith seductive refinement and refreshing decadence. TOM FORD's latest private blend creation unapologetically exudes the endless pursuit of sun and luxury that defines TOM FORD Soleil.

How To Use

Do not burn longer than 1/2 hours or leave unattended. Allow the candle to solidify before relighting. Should black smoke appear, trim the wick. It should be clean and no longer than 1/4" (6mm). Do not burn down to the bottom, or on or near anything that can catch fire. Keep out of reach of children and pets.

name: Tom Ford Private Blend Neroli Portofino Candle
description:
Notes:Tunisian Neroli, Italian Bergamot, Sicilian Lemon, Winter Yellow Mandarin, Orange Flower, Lavender.Style:Vibrant. Sparkling. Transportive.
To Tom Ford, this scent perfectly captures the cool breezes, sparkling clear water, and lush foliage of the Italian Rivera. His reinvention of a classic eau de cologne features crisp citrus oils, surprising floral notes, and amber undertones to leave a splashy yet substantive impression.

name: La Vie Est Belle L’EAU DE PARFUM LIMITED EDITION
description:
75ml Eau de Parfum TESTER BOX

La Vie Est Belle Edition Limitee by Lancome is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. La Vie Est Belle Edition Limitee was launched in 2016. La Vie Est Belle Edition Limitee was created by Olivier Polge, Dominique Ropion and Anne Flipo. Top notes are Black Currant, Orange and Pear; middle notes are Jasmine, iris and Orange Blossom; base notes are Praline, Vanilla, Patchouli, Tonka Bean and Bitter Almond.

name: GUCCI MEMOIRE D'UNE ODEUR PINK
description:
100ml Eau de Parfum
Gucci Mémoire d’une Odeur’s Roman chamomile is structured with Indian Coral Jasmine petals, has a depth of precious musks, and wood notes of sandalwood, cedarwood, as well as a vanilla. 
The fragrance aims to disrupt the traditional olfactive families that classifies fragrances, with a new modern fragrance category, Mineral.

name: Jewellessence Blue by Designer SHAIK, Opulent Shaik Classic No. 77 (TESTER BOX)
description:
100ml Eau de Parfum (TESTER BOX)
Opulent Shaik Classic No 77Opulent Shaik Classic No 77 by Shaik is a Oriental fragrance for men. Top notes are bergamot, lemon, lavender and basil; middle notes are geranium, cloves, apple and cinnamon; base notes are cedar, patchouli, oakmoss, labdanum, vanilla and musk.

name: Tom Ford Black Orchid 30ML
description:
Eau De Parfum Spray 30ml
Black Orchid by Tom Ford is an oriental floral fragrance for women.
Black Orchid contains a luxurious mix of floral, citrus and wood notes, with chocolate, tuberose, patchouli, orchid and vanilla being the most noticeable. This dark, mysterious and sophisticated scent has become one of Tom Ford’s most beloved releases.
Black Orchid by Tom Ford was launched in 2006.

name: WATERLILY 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML
Radiant white waterlilies, crown jewels of a secret garden pond. Discovered on our adventures. These pristine petals release a clean floralcy that stirs and enchants. The dewy freshness of these floating blooms is enhanced with a flourish of jasmine sambac and neroli.

name: OSMANTHUS 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML
Delicately exotic, these tiny white blossoms capture the duality of soft, apricot sweetness against contrasting deep, warming notes.
Luminous petitgrain and luscious peach and orange flower ripple over voluptuous cashmere wood.

name: YUJA 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML 
Inspired by the spirited streets of Seoul, the Jo Malone London Yuja Cologne balances exotic notes of thirst-quenching fruitiness against the arresting essence of deep woody accords, culminating in a fresh, fierce and truly tantalising aroma.
Plush gardens roll out across an open stretch of land, replete with the sharp, sweet scent of sparkling Yuja. The bright, zesty aroma shines at the top of the cologne before slipping into a fragrant heart of Clary Sage. Cool, calming and confident in equal measure, this core note drifts from the centre to enhance the Jo Malone perfume with an earthy, herbaceous quality.

name: SILK BLOSSOM 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologone 30ML
Forever finding new ways to captivate our senses, Jo Malone London continues to tempt us with Blossoms - a collection of fragrances that capture the refreshing natural scents of springtime blooms. Enter: Silk Blossom. A sweet and enticing scent, the cologne is a celebration of the flowers that are irresistible to hummingbirds and butterflies. Apricot fresh with a touch of spice, it's enhanced with soft heliotrope, and deepened with earthy moss. Jo Malone London cologne Scent: Silk Blossom Top note: white pepper.

name: CADE & CEDARWOOD 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML



Jo Malone London's cologne recreates the scent of smoldering embers in a wood-burning stove and the feeling of "basking in its warm and comforting glow." It's infused with notes of smoky Cade and deep Cedarwood, complemented with an accord of Ciste Labdanum and sweet Vanilla. This 30ml bottle is perfect for slipping into your tote, so you can keep your scent topped up all day.

name: WILLOW & AMBER 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML
The expressive weeping willow, gently draping across the fresh morning water. Captured in the woody pairing of cashmere wood and smoky vetiver, enhanced by softly sensual amber.

name: NETTLE & WILD ACHIELLA by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML 
The fresh green fragrance of Jo Malone London’s Nettle &amp; Wild Achillea Cologne begins by unveiling the floral softness and delicate petally touch of white yarrow. At its heart, a green stingy note peeks through with a peppery top, while the vetiver base softens the scent with a lingering trail of white musk. Its decorative bottle comes presented with hand-painted floral illustrations.

name: LUPIN & PATCHOULI by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML
Lupin &amp; Patchouli by Jo Malone London is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lupin &amp; Patchouli was launched in 2019. Lupin &amp; Patchouli was created by Yann Vasnier and Louise Turner.

name: CHANEL NO. 5 L'EAU 35ML
description:
Eau de Toilette 35ML
Chanel No. 5 L'eau Perfume by Chanel, Designed by master perfumer Olivier Polge, Chanel No. 5 L'eau is intended to bring all the sophistication and class of Chanel No. 5 to the younger generations. This lighter, fresher version draws the nose in with fresh opening notes of lemon, mandarin orange, neroli, bergamot, lime, and aldehydes. Middle notes are ylang ylang, jasmine, and may rose. The base notes for this fragrance are rich musk, vanilla, cedar, and orris root to keep with the timeless classic without sacrificing the simplicity of the scent.

name: CHANEL NO. 5 EAU DE PARFUM 35ML
description:
Eau de Parfum 35ML


N°5, the very essence of femininity. An aldehyde floral bouquet housed in an iconic bottle with a minimalist design. A timeless, legendary fragrance.



Olfactory atmosphere

The eau de parfum draws inspiration from the parfum with which it shares its floral aldehyde signature. This floral bouquet composed around May Rose and Jasmine features bright citrus top notes. Aldehydes create a unique presence, and the smooth touch of Vanilla an incredibly sensual trail.

name: CREED SILVER MOUNTAIN WATER
description:
Eau de Parfum 100ML
Inspired by the exhilarating crispness of mountain air and the purity of cascading alpine streams, a bracing landscape in which the Creed family find relaxation and renewal. 
A contempory scent which captures the purity of citrus notes, tea, blackcurrant and musk.Cool, clean, icy and mentholated -reminiscent of sparkling streams coursing through the snowcapped Swiss Alps.Top notes: Bergamot, Mandarin, NeroliHeart notes: Green Tea, Blackcurrant BudBase notes: Sandalwood, Musk

name: Gucci The Alchemist's Garden: A Chant for The Nymph
description:
Eau de Parfum 100ML
Crafted from pure natural plants and flowers layered with modern molecules, each fragrance and formula in the Alchemist’s Garden is inspired by the science of alchemy, telling the story of a place, a moment, or a memory. A Chant for the Nymph is an ode to tropical forests filled with sublimating solar flowers. The fragrance is inspired by the Frangipani, which symbolizes immortality for the heavenly and enduring smell that it releases on warm nights. Hiding behind the intoxicating Ylang Ylang and sensual Tiare flower, the flowers are warmed by soft Vanilla.

name: NEROLI PORTOFINO 100ML by TOM FORD
description:
Eau de Parfum 100ml

SOLEIL BLANC 50ML by TOM FORD
