Eau de Soleil Blanc by Tom Ford is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Eau de Soleil Blanc was launched in 2018. Top notes are Bitter Orange, Neroli, Pistachio, Bergamot, Citron, Petitgrain, Cardamom, Pink Pepper and Caraway; middle notes are Tuberose, Tunisian Orange Blossom, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine and Galbanum; base notes are Coconut, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Amber and Benzoin.

name: NOIR DE NOIR 50ML by TOM FORD
description:
Eau de Parfum 50ml
Noir de Noir by Tom Ford is a Chypre fragrance for women and men. Noir de Noir was launched in 2007. Noir de Noir was created by Jacques Cavallier and Harry Fremont. Top note is Saffron; middle notes are Black Rose, Truffle and Floral Notes; base notes are Patchouli, Vanilla, Agarwood (Oud) and Oakmoss.

name: JASMINE ROUGE 50ML by TOM FORD
description:
Eau de Parfum 50ML
Tom Ford Jasmin Rouge Perfume by Tom Ford, Tom Ford Jasmin Rouge is a fragrance that was introduced in 2011 along with Violet Blonde, and Santal Blush. The fragrance opens with notes of bergamot, mandarin, cinnamon, ginger, cardamom, black and white pepper. At its heart, the scent contains jasmine, neroli, ylang-ylang, and clary sage. The base notes are Mexican vanilla, labdanum, leather, wood, and amber.

name: TOM FORD Tobacco Oud 50ML
description:
Eau de Parfum 50ML
Tobacco Oud by Tom Ford is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. Tobacco Oud was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Gillotin. Top note is Whiskey; middle notes are Spicy Notes, Cinnamon and Coriander; base notes are Tobacco, Agarwood (Oud), Sandalwood, Patchouli, Incense, Benzoin, Vanilla and Cedar.

name: SOLE DI POSITANO 50ML by TOM FORD
description:
Eau de Parfum 50ML
Sole di Positano by Tom Ford is a Citrus fragrance for women and men. Sole di Positano was launched in 2017. Top notes are Bitter Orange, Mandarin Orange, Lemon, Calabrian bergamot and Petitgrain; middle notes are Neroli, Orange Blossom, Jasmine, Shiso, Ylang-Ylang and Lily-of-the-Valley; base note is Moss.

name: TOBACCO VANILLE 50ML by TOM FORD
description:
Eau de Parfum 50ml
A luxurious and warming fragrance that highlights a heady modern fusion between sweet, sensual vanilla and spicy tobacco accord. With a rich scent that paints the marvel of an English Gentleman's club, this fragrance opens into a medley of tobacco and spicy notes. The heart samples a deep vanilla chord surrounded in tonka bean, tobacco blossom and bitter cacao. Finishing the scent is a final layer of woods and dried fruits.

name: LOST CHERRY 50ML by TOM FORD
description:
Eau de Parfum 50ML
Lost Cherry by Tom Ford is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lost Cherry was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Louise Turner. Top notes are Sour Cherry, Bitter Almond and Liquor; middle notes are Sour Cherry, Plum, Turkish Rose and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Tonka Bean, Vanilla, Peru Balsam, Benzoin, Cinnamon, Sandalwood, Cedar, Cloves, Vetiver and Patchouli.

name: DIPTYQUE PHILOSYKOS
description:
Eau de Parfum 75ml
The memory of a Greek summer at Mount Pelion where, to get to the sea, there was a natural grove of wild sun-soaked fig trees to cross through. Philosykos is an ode to the entire fig tree: the green freshness of the leaves, the milky flavour of the figs, underpinned by the woody density of the tree.

name: Y Eau Fraiche Yves Saint Laurent
description:
Eau de Toilette 100ml
Y Eau Fraiche by Yves Saint Laurent is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Y Eau Fraiche was launched in 2020. Top notes are Lemon, Ginger and Pepper; middle notes are Geranium, Lavender, Mint and Juniper Berries; base notes are Cedar and Olibanum.

name: Beau De Jour Eau de Parfum by Tom Ford
description:
Eau de Parfum 100ml
Beau De Jour Eau de Parfum by Tom Ford is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Beau De Jour Eau de Parfum was launched in 2020. Top notes are Lavender Extract and Lavender; middle notes are Rosemary, Oakmoss, Mint, Basil and Geranium; base notes are Patchouli and Amber.

name: LE LABO BAIE 19
description:
Eau de Parfum 100ml
Inspired by the olfactive phenomenon of petrichor – the distinctive yet elusive smell that lingers after heavy rainfall – Le Labo’s Baie 19 perfume is imbued with an equally mysterious quality that reveals itself when in contact with the skin. Just like the drops of water that bring life to flora after a long drought, Baie 19 revitalises the dry juniper berry and patchouli with salty ambrox, spicy cade and woody musks.

name: LE LABO GAIAC 10 TOKYO
description:
Eau de Parfum 100ml
A Tokyo-inspired perfume could smell like yakitori, smog, and underground transit, but instead Le Labo bottled up the Japanese humidity and made it tense, earthy, and woody thanks to a handful of rural notes, like cedar and frankincense. So, the next time you’re trapped in a metro tunnel, gripping the only empty inches of free pole space in sight, hoping you have hand sanitizer in your purse, sniff your wrist and transport yourself to the Japanese forest floor where the soul-crushing pain of your daily commute is nothing but a distant memory.

name: Jo Malone London Peony & Blush Suede Scent Surround™ Diffuser
description:
Size 165ml
This sleekly designed diffuser effortlessly and continuously adds an enveloping scent to any space.The essence of charm, this scent captures exquisitely fragile peonies in voluptuous bloom. A flirtatious, juicy bite of red apple and the opulence of jasmine, rose, and gillyflower mingle with the sensuality of soft, blush suede for a luxurious and seductive trail.From colognes and candles to bath and body care, each Jo Malone London product comes presented in their signature gift box and ribbon.Place reeds into the oil, then allow 24 to 36 hours for the fragrance to diffuse for the continuous Scent Surround™ experience. Fragrance will last for around three to four months.

name: HONEY & CROCUS 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML
Jo Malone Honey &amp; Crocus is a cologne with floral and gourmet scent for women and men, created in 2018 by perfumer Mathilde Bijaoue. The natural flavour of Honey &amp; Crocus from the brand's new limited edition collection, which is based on English cultural traditions and dedicated to the rich nature and soothing aromas of the UK countryside.

name: POPPY & BARLEY 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML
The new British Fields series, designed with the concept of FRAGRANCE COMBINING™ art, contains 5 unique styles of limited-edition fragrances, each of them presents its simple and elegant style.The colorful red poppies swaying in the golden wheat field illuminated by the sun, the violet and black currant intertwined with the fruit, nestled in the embrace of barley and wheat bran, plus the romance of white musk, full of fascinating vitality, at the same time, exudes a soft and pleasant atmosphere.

name: GREEN WHEAT & MEADOWSHEET 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML
An English field at dawn, full of the joys of spring. Filled with young, green wheat. Crisp and fresh. Balanced with a zesty twist of grapefruit. Mingled with soft, white notes of meadowsweet. Pretty. Fresh. Powdery.

name: OAT & CORNFLOWER 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML
Wholesome oats gathered from the field, fit for a hearty feast. Warm and delicious. Enlivened by vivid blue cornflowers and a hint of hazelnut. Complemented by an elegant vetiver base. Mouthwatering. Warm. Sensual.Part of the Jo Malone London English Fields Collection.

name: PRIMEROSE & RYE 30ML by JO MALONE
description:
Cologne 30ML
Rolling fields dotted with primroses. Swaying softly on a spring breeze. Warmed by golden corn. Brightened with mimosa. On an addictive base of rye and vanilla. Filled with sunshine. Vivid. Glowing. Addictive.

name: Amber & Lavender 30ML by Jo Malone
description:
Cologne 30ML
Known for her fashion credentials, Poppy Delevingne redressed perfume bottles for a curated collection dubbed "Queen of Pop'. 


Within the brightly colored vessel is the British fragrance brand's refined Amber &amp; Lavender cologne; a classic scent that pulls French lavender and woody petitgrain
through the warm, honey-like scent of amber.

name: GUCCI GUILTY POUR FEMME
description:
Eau de Parfum 90ML
Gucci Guilty Pour Femme EDP is a wonderful perfume, for the optimistic and playful woman who appreciates her whole life with is especially grateful. The scent opens at the top with sour lime, juicy orange, and spicy pink pepper that adds a delicious and oriental touch to the whole scent. The next notes that will enchant your senses come from the large bouquet of flowers, which consists of hyacinths, violets, roses and beautiful fragrant geraniums that get your thoughts directed to the first spring day when the flowers begin to bloom in full bloom. A wonderful Eau de Parfum that is most delicately rounded off at the bottom with the scent of patchouli and amber that makes it warm and makes it envelop the body in the most guilty way. A must-have for the spacious woman with respect for herself and her surroundings.

name: DAVIDOFF COOL WATER WOMAN
description:
Eau de Toilette 100ML
With a name that announces an aquatic blend of crisp aromas, Cool Water by Davidoff evokes images of days at the beach, with fresh water hitting the shore and bursting in cool droplets into the breezy air. Pineapple, quince and melon notes open this scent on fresh fruity tones, with lily and lotus watery hints emerging as an energizing fragrant mix. Making its debut in 1996, Cool Water eau de toilette spray for women is a clean and invigorating summer scent, the perfect choice when you need your fragrance to cool your senses down.

name: MISS DIOR ROSE N ROSES  by DIOR
description:
Eau de Toilette 100ML
The new sparkling floral eau de toilette. A profusion of fresh and colourful Grasse Rose petals, vivified by citrusy dew.
For Miss Dior Rose N'Roses, François Demachy crafted a fresh rose with bright, vibrant florality, vivified by citrusy notes. The sensation of an armful of fresh and colourful petals that sweeps you away to an endless field of blooming roses.The heart of this new fragrance swirls with a rose grown by the exclusive partners of the house of Dior, and harvested using traditional methods to preserve its most precious properties.

name: TWILLY D'HERMES 50ML
description:
Eau de Parfum 50ML
The scent for the Hermes girl, a daring fragrance woven with striking ginger and sensual tuberose. A floral, spicy and exotic eau de parfum.Olfactory emotion: Warm, SensualMain raw materials: Ginger, Tuberose, Sandalwood

name: Love Don't Be Shy by KILIAN
description:
Eau de Parfum 50ml
Love, Don’t Be Shy is part of the Kilian Narcotics family. From rose to tuberose, from orange blossom to gardenia—Kilian flowers are composed like a narcotic dependence. The Perfumer is Calice Becker.

name: Playing with the Devil by KILIAN
description:
Eau de Parfum 50ML
Playing With The Devil by By Kilian is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. Playing With The Devil was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. Top notes are Black Currant, White Peach, Litchi and Blood Orange; middle notes are Pimento, Pepper, Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Cedar, Vanila, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Benzoin and Tonka Bean.

name: Good Girl Gone Bad Extreme By KILIAN
description:
Eau de Parfum 50ML
Good Girl Gone Bad Extreme by By Kilian is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. Good Girl Gone Bad Extreme was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Osmanthus, Jasmine and Rose de Mai; middle notes are Milk, Tuberose and Narcissus; base notes are Amber and White Cedar Extract.

name: Bottega Veneta Illusione For Her
description:
Eau De Parfum 75ml
Bottega Veneta llusione, the new fragrance for her, is a suspended moment between dream and reality. The scent is a feminine floral, woody fragrance with aromatic notes of bergamot and blackcurrant blended with orange blossom and refreshing green fig leaves. The sensual fragrance is beautifully rounded off with olive wood and Tonka been essences. This light and hazy shaded bottle combines square-shaped architectural lines with a beautiful organic shape in the bottle base reminiscent of a drop of water. Top Notes: blackcurrantHeart Notes: orange blossomBase Notes: olive wood

name: Luna by Penhaligon's
description:
Eau De Toilette 100ML
Luna by Penhaligon's is a fragrance for women and men. Luna was launched in 2016. Top notes are Lemon, Bergamot and Bitter Orange; middle notes are Juniper Berries, Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Balsam Fir, Musk and Ambergris.

name: Penhaligon's Endymion Eau De Cologne
description:
Eau De Cologne 100ml
Born from a time when one’s toilette or cologne was of the highest concern, Penhaligon’s create innovative fragrances that tell a story. Founded by William Penhaligon in the 1870’s, this classic British company continues to create incredible fragrances that take your senses on a journey like no other.Spicy and fresh, the Endymion Eau De Cologne is a fragrance of sensual contrasts. This distinct fragrance opens up with soft citrus tones give way to a heart of geranium and coffee absolute, finished off with a strong base of nutmeg, leather, frankincense and myrrh. Housed within a beautiful glass bottle, Endymion is perfect for the mysterious modern gentleman.

name: Jo Malone Myrrh & Tonka Scent Surround™ Diffuser
description:
Size 165ml
An understated and sleek diffuser that effortlessly and continuously adds the enveloping scent of Myrrh &amp; Tonka to any space.
Fragrance story: Rich, hand-harvested sap of the Namibian myrrh tree mingles with the warm almond and delicious vanilla notes of tonka bean to create Myrrh &amp; Tonka.
Notes: Namibian myrrh tree, almond, vanilla, tonka bean.
How to use: Place the reeds into the oil then allow 24–36 hours for the fragrance to diffuse for the continuous Scent Surround experience. The fragrance will last for around 3–4 months.

name: F**KING FABULOUS 100ML by TOM FORD
description:
Eau de Parfum  100ml - Censored Version
About Fucking Fabulous
Fucking Fabulous is a shared / unisex perfume by Tom Ford. The scent was launched in 2017.


Fucking Fabulous fragrance notes



Almond Bitter Oil,

Tonka Resinoid,

Orris Accord,

Cashmeran,

Leather Accord,
Clary Sage Oil

name: GUCCI BLOOM - ACQUA DI FIORI by GUCCI
description:
100ml - Eau de Toilette
About Gucci Bloom Acqua di Fiori
Gucci Bloom Acqua di Fiori is a feminine perfume by Gucci. The scent was launched in 2018 and the fragrance was created by perfumer Alberto Morillas

Gucci Bloom Acqua di Fiori fragrance notes


Top Notes



Blackcurrant,
Galbanum



Heart Notes



Chinese honeysuckle,

Jasmine,
Tuberose



Base notes



Sandalwood,
Musk

name: CHANEL NO. 5 L’EAU RED EDITION by  CHANEL
description:
100ml - Eau de Toilette
Chanel No 5 Parfum Red Edition by Chanel is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Chanel No 5 Parfum Red Edition was launched in 2018. Top notes are Aldehydes and Neroli; middle notes are Jasmine and May Rose; base note is Woody Notes.

name: Narciso Rodriguez for him Bleu Noir Extreme EDT
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
Experience the refreshing vibrancy of Narciso Rodriguez For Him Bleu Noir Extreme Eau de Toilette, a woody-aromatic fragrance for men.
Created for the modern man, Narciso Rodriguez’ fragrance reimagines freshness. Upon the first spritz, the Eau de Toilette welcomes a crisp citrus top note that is created by green mandarin and basil. A heart note of musk creates a deeper, more sensual tone before the base note of blue cedar, black ebony and cistus leave a woody and masculine final statement.
Reinventing the original Narciso Rodriguez For Him Bleu Noir, this fragrance focuses on creating an aromatic freshness as opposed to timeless elegance, which Narciso Rodriguez represents in a sturdy bottle that blends from frosted to transparent glass.
The Bleu Noir Extreme aroma merges a sense of mystery with a deep intensity, creating a fragrance that is subtle yet seductive.

name: UN JARDIN SUR LE TOIT by HERMES
description:
100ml Eau de Toilette
Un Jardin Sur Le Toit by Hermès is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. Un Jardin Sur Le Toit was launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean-Claude Ellena.

Un Jardin Sur Le Toit refers to the especially luxurious garden located on the Hermes’ headquarters building roof at 24 Rue Faubourg Saint-Honore in Paris.
The garden is full of aromatic herbs, flowers, and fruits whose flavors vary as they pass through the metamorphosis induced by the seasons. Its fresh and sweet-smelling atmosphere is captured by apple, pear, rose, green grass, basil, magnolia, and compost notes.

name: Guerlain Shalimar - Eau De Parfum
description:
90ML Eau de Parfum
Guerlain Shalimar Eau De Parfum is a classic oriental fragrance for women. A voluptuous, sensual and embracing fragrance.  
Top notes: Bergamot, Lemon 
Heart notes: Jasmine, Rose, Rose (May Rose or Rose de Mai) 
Base notes: Iris (Orris), Incense, Opopanax, Tonka bean, Vanilla

name: TOBACCO OUD 100ML by TOM FORD
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
A private blend, Tobacco Oud explores the secret history of an addictive Arabic passion for crafting fragrances from precious oud wood resin and the smoke of aromatic tobacco. 
The fragrance intertwines mesmerizing oud with an idealized Arabic tobacco accord inspired by "dokha," a blend of herbs, flowers and spice-laden tobacco.

name: JOY by DIOR
description:
100ml Eau de Parfum
Joy by Dior by Christian Dior is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Joy by Dior was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Francois Demachy. Top notes are Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Jasmine, Grasse Rose, Peach and Cassis; base notes are White Musk, Sandalwood, Cedar, Patchouli and Benzoin.

name: Bottega Veneta Illusione For Him Eau de Toilette
description:
90ML Eau de Toilette
Bottega Veneta llusione the new aftershave fragrance for him. A suspended moment between dream and reality.
The scent is a masculine woody, citrus, aromatic fragrance, combining sparkling colours of Italian citrus with lemon and bitter orange essences. A fresh and aromatic element is added with fir basalm and white cedarwood, with powerful notes of vetiver and sensual tonka been completing the accomplished composition.
This light and hazy shaded bottle combines square-shaped architectural lines with a beautiful organic shape in the bottle base reminiscent of a drop of water. A timeless and sensual design.

name: Gucci The Alchemist's Garden: The Virgin Violet
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
Alessandro Michele carefully studied the naturally occurring essence of flowers to create each Eau de Parfum in Gucci's latest 'The Alchemist's Garden' collection. The designer compares 'The Virgin Violet' to the elegance of a swan, translated through a blend of Musk, Violet Leaves and Iris Petals. It's housed in a lacquered glass bottle inspired by containers found in a vintage apothecary.

name: The Favourite by Penhaligon's
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
The Favourite by Penhaligon's is a new floral musk fragrance for women. Inspired by the Sarah Churchill, Duchess of Marlborough and the subject of the movie The Favourite, this powdery floral scent includes notes of mandarin, bergamot, and violet leaves blending into a heart of jasmine sambac, mimosa, and orris, with a dry down of ambroxan, musk, and creamy Indian sandalwood. The classic Penhaligon's perfume bottle features a pale pink hue, red label, golden accents, and is adorned with a pink velvet bow. Launched in 2020, this "smoke and mirrors...iris and musk" feminine fragrance is available in an eau de parfum spray.

name: COCO MADEMOISELLE INTENSE by CHANEL
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
An intense new facet of the Coco Mademoiselle personality emerges to forge a powerful, deep, addictive fragrance that is irresistible in every way.
Fragrance Notes: An extreme, luminous and deep concentration of Patchouli infuses Coco Mademoiselle Eau De Parfum Intense with a voluptuous dimension. The warm, soft and feminine Amber accord — an intoxicating blend of Tonka Bean and Vanilla from Madagascar — wraps the scent in sensuality.

name: BYREDO Night Veil Sellier Extrait de Parfum
description:
100ML Extrait de Parfum
From a new series of Night Veils - fragrances based around flowers and leather that use raw materials chosen with meticulous care - Byredo presents its Sellier extrait de parfum. Distinguished, sombre, smoky, it is a truly unbridled concentration of leather. The olfactory surprise explodes from the very first second, teleporting you to a vintage smoking room with precious tobacco leaves, antique books and age-worn leather club chairs.


Base notes: Birch tree, Oak moss


Middle notes: Leather accord, Tobacco leaves


Top notes: Cashmeran, Black tea

name: BYREDO Night Veils Reine de Nuit Extrait de Parfum
description:
100ML Extrait de Parfum
Distilled into a pure essence, each Night Veils fragrance taps noble raw materials chosen with meticulous care. With its high concentration, this new trio reinvents a new perfume ritual. Reine de Nuit is a testament to how empowering a rich floral perfume can be in the twilight hours. It revives the rich tradition of oriental perfumes and celebrates the intrinsic seductiveness of the rose. Reine de Nuit has a sensual and spellbinding scent.

name: Giorgio Armani My Way EDP 50ML
description:
50ML Eau de Parfum
Giorgio Armani My Way EDP is an absolutely wonderful feminine fragrance that takes you on probably the most important journey of your life. Namely, to find yourself and your own path through all your experiences and acquaintances. This fragrance has a sensational and uplifting effect on both body and mind, and inspires you to get to know your best sides through nature and other people, so that they can radiate. A timeless scent that with its notes shows that you are an open and curious person who is ready to learn and who is finding his own way in life. The notes in this rich fragrance include tuberose, orange blossom and Indian jasmine, which are the ones that open the fragrance and embrace the body in a wonderful way. Then the bergamot, the white musk, the sweet vanilla and the warm cedar come into their own. They are the ones that collect the scent, and make it more deep and harmonious, and give the final tingle that pushes you out on your journey.

name: Giorgio Armani My Way EDP 90ML
description:
90ML Eau de Parfum
Giorgio Armani My Way EDP is an absolutely wonderful feminine fragrance that takes you on probably the most important journey of your life. Namely, to find yourself and your own path through all your experiences and acquaintances. This fragrance has a sensational and uplifting effect on both body and mind, and inspires you to get to know your best sides through nature and other people, so that they can radiate. A timeless scent that with its notes shows that you are an open and curious person who is ready to learn and who is finding his own way in life. The notes in this rich fragrance include tuberose, orange blossom and Indian jasmine, which are the ones that open the fragrance and embrace the body in a wonderful way. Then the bergamot, the white musk, the sweet vanilla and the warm cedar come into their own. They are the ones that collect the scent, and make it more deep and harmonious, and give the final tingle that pushes you out on your journey.

name: ENVY ME by GUCCI
description:
100ml - Eau de Toilette
Envy Me by Gucci is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Envy Me was launched in 2004. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Dubreuil. Top notes are Peony, Pink Pepper, Pineapple, Jasmine, Mango, Peach and Cassia; middle notes are Peony, Litchi, Rose, Pomegranate, Musk, White Tea and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Tobacco, Teak Wood, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean.

name: Marc Jacobs Decadence Eau de Parfum Spray
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
Glamourously luxurious. Impulsively indulgent.Marc Jacobs Decadence is an invitation to indulge. It makes a statement with bold styling, luxurious craftsmanship and a revolutionary bottle design inspired by one of Marc?s iconic handbags. Decadence is a indulgent sensual woody scent. The fragrance captivates with a sultry top of succulent italian plum, golden saffron and velvety iris. The heart is a bouquet of rich bulgarian rose that mingles with lush orris and creamy nuances of jasmine sambac. Sexy liquid amber, heady vetiver and warm papyrus woods dry down to a signature of sophisticated indulgence.

name: BYREDO Rose Of No Man's Land 100ML
description:
100ML Unisex Eau de Parfum
Rose of No Man's Land is the nickname given by soldiers to the nurses who saved thousands of lives during WWI. The scent is tribute to selflessness and compassion.

Top: Pink Pepper, Turkish Rose Petals

Heart: Raspberry Blossom, Turkish Rose Absolute

Base: Papyrus, White Amber

name: Bvlgari Rose Goldea
description:
90ML Eau de Parfum
Rose Goldea by Bvlgari is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. Rose Goldea was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Rose, Musk, Pomegranate and Bergamot; middle notes are Damask Rose, Peony, Jasmine and Peach; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood, Olibanum and Vanilla.

name: Bvlgari Rose Goldea Jacky Tsai Edition
description:
90ML Eau de Parfum
Rose Goldea Jacky Tsai Edition by Bvlgari is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Rose Goldea Jacky Tsai Edition was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Rose, Pomegranate, Musk and Bergamot; middle notes are Damask Rose, Peony, Jasmine and Peach; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Sandalwood and Olibanum.

name: BYREDO Mojave Ghost 100ML
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
In the xeric wilderness of the Mojave desert, trees and vegetation more ancient than many civilizations defy conditions that prey on human vulnerability. The ghost flower is a rare species that dares to blossom above this baked, hard ground. Despite its arid surroundings and inability to produce nectar, the ghost flower, or mohavea confertiflora, maintains its perfect, majestic beauty and thrives year after year. In an astonishing feat of ingenuity, the flower uses mimicry to attract the pollinators of a neighboring plant species by developing markings that resemble those of a female bee genus attracted to its subject and duping the male bee into following suit. This moving human-like behavior and captivating tale of survival lies in the foundation that inspired Mojave Ghost, an homage to this most bewitching flower.
Style: Woody, aromatic.
Notes:
- Top: ambrette, Jamaican nesberry.
- Middle: violet, sandalwood, magnolia.
- Base: chantilly musk, crisp amber, cedarwood.

name: BYREDO BLANCHE 50ML
description:
50ML Eau de Parfum
Stockholm-based fragrance house Byredo boasts a bespoke selection of innovative fragrances that refresh traditional olfactory scents, and this Blanche Eau de Parfum one is of no exception. Testament to the brand's perfumery capabilities and inspired by the naive innocence of the colour white, this scent bestows the appreciation for natural beauty with pure and simple white rose, pink pepper, blonde woods and musk.

name: BYREDO Gypsy Water 50ML
description:
50ML Eau de Parfum
Byredo's Gypsy Water Eau de Parfum expresses a carefree spirit with down-to-earth nature elements. Recalling the fresh flowing waters and soil of riverbeds and deep forests, this fragrance is the glamorisation of Romany lifestyle in a single phial. Marinated with incense, pine needles and orris over a bed of amber and sandalwood, this velvety concoction is lightened with lemon and pepper for an unlikely aquatic touch.

name: BYREDO SUPER CEDAR 50ML
description:
50ML Eau de Parfum
Levelled with a silk musk and Haitian vetiver dry down, BYREDO's newest fragrance, the Super Cedar Eau de Parfum is a new take on woody scents. Evoking simpler times with a sense of nostalgia, this rose petal-infused scent brings to mind freshly shaven pencils. Down-to-earth, it warmly embraces a classic scent with overtly modern attributes.

Top notes: Rose petals
Heart notes: Virginian cedarwood
Base notes: Silk musk and Haitian vetiver

name: BYREDO Mojave Ghost 50ML
description:
50ML Eau de Parfum
In the xeric wilderness of the Mojave desert, trees and vegetation more ancient than many civilizations defy conditions that prey on human vulnerability. The ghost flower is a rare species that dares to blossom above this baked, hard ground. Despite its arid surroundings and inability to produce nectar, the ghost flower, or mohavea confertiflora, maintains its perfect, majestic beauty and thrives year after year. In an astonishing feat of ingenuity, the flower uses mimicry to attract the pollinators of a neighboring plant species by developing markings that resemble those of a female bee genus attracted to its subject and duping the male bee into following suit. This moving human-like behavior and captivating tale of survival lies in the foundation that inspired Mojave Ghost, an homage to this most bewitching flower.
Style: Woody, aromatic.
Notes:
- Top: ambrette, Jamaican nesberry.
- Middle: violet, sandalwood, magnolia.
- Base: chantilly musk, crisp amber, cedarwood.

name: BYREDO BAL D'AFRIQUE 50ML
description:
50ML Eau de Parfum
Bal d’Afrique reflects that; it’s an imaginary journey as well as a complete celebration of how I see African culture and its influence.” With a focus on beauty and fantasy, this Bal d'Afrique Eau de Parfum from Byredo is the founder Ben Gorham’s ‘love letter’ to Africa. Summing up and celebrating the reach and influence of Africa through time, particularly the way its myriad cultures have shaped dance, art and music, this essential is the idea of an imaginary event.

Top notes: Bergamot, lemon, Neroli, African marigold and bucchu
Heart notes: Violet, jasmine petals and cyclamen
Base notes: Black amber, musk, vetiver and Moroccan cedarwood

name: BYREDO Rose Of No Man's Land 50ML
description:
50ML Unisex Eau de Parfum
Rose of No Man's Land is the nickname given by soldiers to the nurses who saved thousands of lives during WWI. The scent is tribute to selflessness and compassion.

Top: Pink Pepper, Turkish Rose Petals

Heart: Raspberry Blossom, Turkish Rose Absolute

Base: Papyrus, White Amber

name: BYREDO INFLORESCENCE 50ML
description:
50ML Eau de Parfum
Byredo moves away from classic floral scents in this Inflorescence Eau de Parfum. Redefining feminine fragrances with the pinnacle of Spring blossoms, this one results in a dandified complex of pink freesia and lily of the valley, sprinkled with rose petals for classic sensuality. Uplifted with an unlikely base of jasmine, it embodies a refreshing change from its precursors with a soft and creamy body of magnolia.

Top notes: Rose petals and pink freesia
Heart notes: Magnolia and lily of the valley
Base notes: Fresh Jasmine

name: Amouage Epic Man (Tester Box)
description:
100ML - Eau de Parfum with TESTER BOX

Amouage Epic Man by Amouage is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. Amouage Epic Man was launched in 2009. The nose behind this fragrance is Randa Hammami. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Olibanum, Nutmeg, Saffron, Cardamom, Caraway, Mace and Myrtle; middle notes are Myrrh and Geranium; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Incense, Leather, Castoreum, Patchouli, Cedar, Sandalowood, Styrax and Musk.

name: Amouage Library Collection Opus III (Tester Box)
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum with TESTER BOX

The Library Collection Opus III by Amouage is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. The Library Collection Opus III was launched in 2010. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Vinchon Spehner. Top notes are Mimosa, Nutmeg, Clove, Dyer’s Greenweed and Thyme; middle notes are Violet, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine and African Orange flower; base notes are Benzoin, Vanille, Sandalwood, Guaiac Wood, Musk, Ambrette (Musk Mallow), Papyrus and Virginia Cedar.

name: Amouage Library Collection Opus VII (Tester Box)
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum with TESTER BOX
The Library Collection Opus VII by Amouage is an Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. The Library Collection Opus VII was launched in 2013. The Library Collection Opus VII was created by Alberto Morillas and Pierre Negrin. The fragrance features galbanum, pink pepper, cardamom, fenugreek, nutmeg, amber, agarwood (oud), patchouli, leather, ambergris, costus, musk, sandalwood, olibanum and cypriol oil or nagarmotha.

name: LE LABO ROSE 31
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
Rose 31 by Le Labo is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. Rose 31 was launched in 2006. The nose behind this fragrance is Daphne Bugey. Top notes are Rose and Cumin; middle notes are Rose, Vetiver and Cedar; base notes are Musk, Guaiac Wood, Agarwood (Oud), Olibanum and Labdanum.

name: LE LABO BERGAMOTE 22
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
Contrasting notes of petals and bitter citrus fruits make for lasting all-day freshness.
Combining the delicate character of floral petit grain with bitter grapefruit, these contrasting notes meet to give Le Labo's Bergamote 22 Eau de Parfum its unique identity. Initially named 'Fire Cologne', the vegan and cruelty-free fragrance is finished with sweet remnants of amber, musk and vetiver for a dazzling and long-lasting aroma.

name: LE LABO THE NOIR 29
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
Le Labo's 'Thé Noir 29' eau de parfum combines light notes of Bergamot, Fig and Bay Leaves with heady Cedar Wood, Veitver and Musk. It has a heart of Black Tea Leaves that recall the dry, leafy aroma of Tobacco and Hay. This particular scent in the label's vast collection is formulated in collaboration with master perfumer Frank Voelkl.

name: LE LABO IRIS 39
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
Iris is one of the most precious essences in the world. It's the origin of the creamy and woodsy nobility of this exclusive fragrance. The best of the Patchoulis then waft in, bringing with them sensual depth. The perfume is reinforced by a musky base, our very own secret. The result is remarkable elegance.

name: LE LABO Cedre 11 Scented Candle
description:
245gram Scented Candle
Le Labo's candle is infused with a warming blend of Cedar, Birchwood and Gaïac - exactly the kind of scent you'll want to fill your home with through the colder months. It's hand-poured into a glass vessel decorated with the brand's minimalist label. Display it on your coffee table or kitchen counter.

name: LE LABO PETIT GRAIN 21 Scented Candle
description:
245gram Scented Candle
Made with hand-poured soy-blend wax, Le Labo's Petit Grain 21 scented candle brings a light, natural perfume to any room with notes of orange blossom and luscious green undertones.
The delicate essence blended within this signature clear glass votive is a rich and elegant, transforming your home into a lush, Seville-style bitter orange tree garden. With an overall burn time of up to 60 hours, this atmospheric candle is a must-have for the modern interior.

name: Jour D'Hermès Absolu EDP
description:
85ML Eau de Parfum
A new Jour is revealed, zenithal, paradoxical. Gardenia, a bouquet of flowers within a flower bringing together aromas of rose, tuberose and jasmine.Olfactory emotion: Fresh, DelicateMain raw materials: Sweet pea, Gardenia

name: DIPTYQUE Impossible Bouquet Eau Moheli
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
Impossible Bouquet Eau Moheli by Diptyque is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Impossible Bouquet Eau Moheli was launched in 2020. Top notes are Ginger and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Floral Notes, Ylang-Ylang and Incense; base notes are Benzoin, Vetiver and Patchouli.

name: DIPTYQUE Impossible Bouquet Eau Des Sens
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
Impossible Bouquet Eau des Sens by Diptyque is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Impossible Bouquet Eau des Sens was launched in 2020. Top notes are Orange Blossom and Bitter Orange; middle note is Juniper Berries; base notes are Patchouli and Angelica.

name: DIPTYQUE Impossible Bouquet Eau Rose
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
Impossible Bouquet Eau Rose by Diptyque is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Impossible Bouquet Eau Rose was launched in 2020. Top notes are Litchi, Black Currant and Bergamot; middle notes are Rose, Geranium and Jasmine; base notes are Honey, Musk and Virginian Cedar.

name: DIPTYQUE Impossible Bouquet L'Ombre Dans L'Eau
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
Impossible Bouquet L'Ombre Dans L'Eau by Diptyque is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Impossible Bouquet L'Ombre Dans L'Eau was launched in 2020. Top notes are Cassis, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Rose, Black Currant and Black currant leaf; base notes are Ambergris and Musk.

name: DIPTYQUE Impossible Bouquet Do Son
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
Impossible Bouquet Do Son by Diptyque is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Impossible Bouquet Do Son was launched in 2020. Top notes are Orange Blossom, Rose and iris; middle notes are Tuberose and Pink Pepper; base notes are Benzoin and Musk.

name: DIPTYQUE Impossible Bouquet Olene
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
Impossible Bouquet Olene by Diptyque is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Impossible Bouquet Olene was launched in 2020. Top notes are Narcissus and Honeysuckle; middle notes are Jasmine and Wisteria; base notes are White Flowers and Green Notes.

name: Maison Margiela REPLICA Lazy Sunday Morning Lunar New Year Limited Edition
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
Maison Margiela's fragrance Lazy Sunday Morning, from the Replica line (abbreviated from "Reproduction of Familiar Scents and Moments of Varying Locations and Periods") that captures memories and moments hidden in our memories, was created by Louise Turner in 2013 with the scent of soft skin and clean cotton sheets in mind. The location for inspiration is Florence, and the period is 2003.
To celebrate the Chinese New Year 2021 (the lunar new year that begins on February 12), a special limited edition of this fragrance in a red bottle is launched. The clean floral composition blends notes of iris, lily of the valley and white musk for an atmosphere of fresh cotton sheets, morning air, and rays of sun, as well as the atmosphere of weekend laziness in bed. 

Top notes: aldehydes, pear, lily of the valleyHeart: rose absolute, iris, orange blossomBase: white musk, ambrette seeds, Indonesian patchouli

name: Gucci Mémoire d'une Odeur
description:
100ml Eau de Parfum
Mémoire d’une Odeur by Gucci is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Mémoire d’une Odeurwas launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Chamomile and Bitter Almond; middle notes are Musk, Indian Jasmine and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Cedar and Vanilla.

name: Anna Sui Fantasia 30ML
description:
30ML Eau de Toilette
The new Eau de Toilette uses unicorn as the protagonist, vowing to arouse childhood dreams and aspirations, even as a grown up, still does not forget the desire for life and the potential of a passionate passion. Even already has a sweet and happy life, still keeps the passion for life, with a rebellious spirit.
The perfume smells a little spicy, very well to reflect how Fantasia’s Muse is – a rebellious beauty, has a complex contradictive character, always has her own ideas, is a set of sweetness and excitement in a perfect and unique girl.
Ingredients and efficacy:Top Notes: Citrus, pink pepper.Middle Notes: Floral elements, raspberry, nuts candies.Base Notes: Himalayan cedar, cypress.

name: Fantasia Mermaid Anna Sui 30ML
description:
30ML Eau de Toilette
Fantasia Mermaid by Anna Sui is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Fantasia Mermaid was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Provenzano. Top notes are Blood Orange, Cardamom and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Litchi, Peony and Jasmine; base notes are Honey, White Wood and Vanilla.

name: MFK À la Rose Travel spray case Gold edition 5 x 0.37 fl.oz. Eau de parfum refills
description:
5 x 0.37 fl.oz. Eau de parfum refills
A bouquet of roses from Grasse and Bulgaria that you can carry in your handbag or suitcase. À la rose is a tribute to free and radiant femininity. Presented in a travel set containing five 0.37 fl.oz. refills and a Gold Edition Globe Trotter travel spray case, À la rose is a declaration of love translated into a fragrance.

name: MON PARIS EDP 50ML by YVES SAINT LAURENT
description:
50ML Eau de Parfum
Capturing the spirit of an intense love affair, YSL introduces Mon Paris perfume - a new expression of love today, inspired by the city of lovers, Paris.
Mon Paris is a fragrance which urges you to seize the moment; transcend the present; and prepare to fall head over heels into the arms of a passionate love.
A subversive reinvention of the traditional chypre, the new floral perfume turns the traditional model upside down, by introducing a brave, bold narcotic white chypre fit for love today.

name: Yves Saint Lauren Mon Paris Eau De Parfum 30ml Fireworks Collector Edition
description:
30ML Eau de Parfum
Mon Paris Dazzling Lights Collector by Yves Saint Laurent is a chypre fruity fragrance.
Top notes: strawberry, raspberry, pear, bergamot, calone, orange, mandarin orange.
Middle notes: Datura, peony, orange blossom, jasmine sambac, Chinese jasmine.
Base notes: patchouli, musk, ambroxan, cedar, moss, vanilla, Indonesian patchouli leaf.

name: NARCISO RODRIGUEZ For Her EDT 75ml (Generous Spray)
description:
75ML Eau de Toilette Generous Spray
Enjoy the graciousness that is Narciso Rodriguez's limited edition Generous Spray. An enveloping mist of our best-selling fragrances.
An elegant, sensual, mysterious and delicate fragrance.
Three notes enhance the heart of musk: floral, amber and woody notes.
Fragrance family: musky, floral, chypre.

Top Notes: osmanthus blossom
Heart Notes: heart of musc
Base Notes: patchouli, amberlyn

name: Narciso Rodriguez For Her EDP 50ML
description:
50ML Eau de Parfum
Narciso for Her perfume is created for very sensitive, delicate and free modern women. The aroma is filled with notes of musk and enhanced with floral, woody and amber notes, which are combined to create the effect of sexuality, charm and mystery.


Aroma type: musky, floral.
Top notes: orange, coriander, Egyptian musk.
Heart notes: bergamot, osmanthus, vanilla.
Base notes: vetiver, flower honey, amber.

name: Narciso Rodriguez Generous Spray EDP Poudrée, 75ml
description:
75ML Eau de Parfum Generous Spray
Enjoy the graciousness that is Narciso Rodriguez's limited edition Generous Spray. An enveloping mist of our best-selling fragrances.
The mystery of attraction captured in a fragrance.
The rendez-vous between velvety jamine, sensual wood and powdery musc.
Fragrance family: Powdery, musky, floral, woody

Top Notes: white jasmine petals &amp; Bulgarian rose
Heart Notes: powdery heart of musc
Base Notes: white and black cedars, vetiver.

name: Narciso Rodriguez Generous Spray Rouge EDP 75ML
description:
57ML Eau de Parfum Generous Spray
Enjoy the graciousness that is Narciso Rodriguez's limited edition Generous Spray. An enveloping mist of our best-selling fragrances.
A fragrance that explores the fine art of temptation further.
 
The signature heart of musc is animated by an exquisite floral bouquet of bulgarian rose, iris and vivid amber woody notes.
 
Fragrance family: Ambery, floral, musky, woody.

Top Notes: bulgarian rose and iris
Heart Notes: heart of musc
Base Notes: Tonka, Vetiver, Black cedar / White cedar

name: Narciso Rodriguez Generous Spray Fleur Musc for Her EDP 75ML
description:
75ML Eau de Parfum Generous Spray
Enjoy the graciousness that is Narciso Rodriguez's limited edition Generous Spray. An enveloping mist of our best-selling fragrances.
The for her signature heart of musc is surrounded by roses, spices, and amber wood, to create a sparkling fragrance.
Fragrance family: Spicy, musky, floral, chypre.

Top Notes: Bouquet of roses and pink Peppercorns
Heart Notes: Heart of Musc
Base Notes: Amber, Patchouli

name: Amouage Interlude Man EDP Spray (Tester Box)
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum TESTER BOX
Amouage Interlude Man is inspired by chaos and disorder. This spicy and woody fragrance opens with zesty bergamot, oregano and pimento berry oil, perpetuating intervals of conflict which are countered by aromatic notes of amber, frankincense, opoponax, cistus and myrrh. Eternal notes of leather, agarwood smoke, patchouli and sandalwood in the base add lasting layers of depth and texture. Made in Oman.

name: BYREDO x Off-White Elevator Music Limited
description: 100ML Eau de Parfum Unisex

name: MISS DIOR EAU DE PARFUM 100ML
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
The new Miss Dior Eau de Parfum reveals the femininity of a sensual floral. Its heart is a floral declaration that combines the beauty of Grasse rose with the boldness of Damascus rose, both wrapped in a ribbon of fresh notes of Calabrian bergamot. This handcrafted creation is woven with rosewood from French Guiana and pink pepper from Reunion Island for heightened character. A Miss Dior that will leave you lovestruck.

name: Versace Bright Crystal Eau De Toilette Spray 30ML
description:
30ML Eau de Toilette
Sheer sensuality, crystal transparency, and luminous brightness: Versace introduces Bright Crystal, a precious jewel of rare beauty characterized by a fresh, vibrant, flowery scent.
The bottle is extraordinary: rich glass, lines purposely essential, the transparency of which enhances the pinky delicacy of the fragrance.
The very elegant crystal cap, faceted and bright like a diamond, seals a bouquet of extreme pureness.
Bright Crystal is bursting with juicy notes of pomegranate, pretty magnolia, peony and lotus flowers with amber and musk.

name: Bvlgari Man Glacial Essence Eau de Parfum
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
BVLGARI MAN GLACIAL ESSENCE enriches the Bvlgari Man collection dedicated to the power of natural elements. After fire and wood, Bvlgari Man explores air. BVLGARI MAN GLACIAL ESSENCE captures the unbridled magnitude of the frozen mountains and the unstoppable masculinity of a man on a constant quest for greatness.
Top notes are Juniper Berries, Ginger and Geranium; middle notes are Sandalwood, Artemisia and Orris Root; base notes are Clearwood, Musk and Cedar.

name: CHANCE Eau Fraiche by Chanel
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
A floral-sparkling fragrance in a round bottle. A surge of energy that sweeps you into a whirlwind of happiness and fantasy. An olfactory encounter with chance.
A floral-sparkling fragrance that intertwines the zesty freshness of Citron, the softness of Jasmine and the vibrant presence of Teak Wood. A whirlwind of energy and vitality.

name: Bvlgari BLV Pour Homme Eau De Toilette Spray
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette 
From icy cold to luxuriously warm, BLV Pour Homme is a fresh, woody and spicy Eau de Toilette. Built around the same unconventional ingredient as BLV-ginger-and combined with tobacco flower, BLV Pour Homme discloses an irresistible power of seduction.

name: Bvlgari Eau Parfumee Au The Bleu Eau de Cologne - Unisex
description:
75ML Eau Perfumee Eau de Cologne
Eau Parfumee au The Bleu by Bvlgari is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. Eau Parfumee au The Bleu was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniela (Roche) Andrier. Top notes are Lavender and Shiso; middle notes are Tea and Violet; base notes are iris and Musk.

name: Bvlgari Eau Parfumee au The Noir for Women - Eau de Cologne
description:
75ML Eau Parfumée Eau de Cologne
Bvlgari Eau Parfumee Au The Noir Perfume by Bvlgari, Created by French perfumer Jacques Cavallier, the unisex Eau Parfumee Au The Noir (black tea) is an Oriental woody perfume with an elegant black tea aroma and deep tobacco and leather scents. The opening floral notes come from rose while the citrus notes are derived from citrus bergamia, otherwise known as bergamot orange. Magnolia and tea provide the floral and green center notes while the base notes consist of leather, patchouli, and oud, or agarwood, which is a fragrant, expensive wood that is often used to make high quality incense.

name: Dior Addict Eau Fraîche 50ML
description:
50ML Eau de Toilette Spray
A crisp botanic fragrance with an oriental trail and 'second skin' feel. Dior Addict Eau Fraiche radiates a glowing femininity. Top notes of gentle Calabrian Bergamot and the sweet and sour citrus notes of Grapefruit blend into the elegant floral notes of Freesia and Lily of the Valley. Ending on a sensuous woody, white musk base, Dior Addict Eau Fraîche is a fresh, feminine experience.

name: Dior Addict Eau de Parfum 50ML
description:
50ML Eau de Parfum
Dior Addict Eau de Parfum (2014) by Dior is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Dior Addict Eau de Parfum (2014)was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Francois Demachy. Top notes are Mandarin Leaf and Orange Blossom; middle note is Jasmine Sambac; base note is Bourbon Vanilla.

name: Bvlgari Allegra Magnifying Bergamot EDP 40ML
description:
40ML Eau de Parfum
MAGNIFYING comprises of precious tailor-made ingredients to intensify magnificent Italian emotions. As their name suggests, these essences are highly concentrated, powerful and vibrant, an expression of true exclusivity. The citrus essence bursts with solar energy. To achieve this especially bright distillation, Calabrian bergamot is harvested when it’s perfectly ripe. Fresh-picked, the bergamot contains sweet and crisp notes. Distilled to retain the fruit’s multi-faceted freshness, MAGNIFYING BERGAMOT exudes the upbeat promise of a gorgeous summer's day.

name: Bvlgari Allegra Magnifying Musk EDP 40ML
description:
40ML Eau de Parfum
MAGNIFYING comprises of precious tailor-made ingredients to intensify magnificent Italian emotions. As their name suggests, these essences are highly concentrated, powerful and vibrant, an expression of true exclusivity. The warm and sultry essence of MAGNIFYING MUSK is inspired by the intimate feel of touch. Crafted with ambrette, the deceptively simple musk reveals a sophisticated radiance. With its notable and expressive luminosity, Magnifying Musk recalls the dazzling joy of an embrace.

name: Bvlgari Allegra Magnifying Patchouli EDP 40ML
description:
40ML Eau de Parfum
MAGNIFYING comprises of precious tailor-made ingredients to intensify magnificent Italian emotions. As their name suggests, these essences are highly concentrated, powerful and vibrant, an expression of true exclusivity. The elegant essence of MAGNIFYING PATCHOULI enchants with a stark sensuality. Made with patchouli sourced from Indonesia, the opulent distillation is of unprecedented quality, free of any dark, earthy notes by exclusive fractionation. Enriched with woody and chypre facets, Magnifying Patchouli rouses a precious and powerful seduction.

name: Bvlgari Allegra Magnifying Rose EDP 40ML
description:
40ML Eau de Parfum
MAGNIFYING comprises of precious tailor-made ingredients to intensify magnificent Italian emotions. As their name suggests, these essences are highly concentrated, powerful and vibrant, an expression of true exclusivity. The floral essence of MAGNIFYING ROSE entices with a velvety, voluptuous intensity. Unlike a classic, powdery rose, this blend of Bulgarian and Turkish roses boasts a remarkable radiance, thanks to a unique fragmentation of essential oils with an unusual distillation. With a sparkle refined by subtle woody notes, Magnifying Rose delivers a luscious bouquet full of the optimism of love.

name: Bvlgari Allegra Magnifying Vanilla EDP 40ML
description:
40ML Eau de Parfum
MAGNIFYING comprises of precious tailor-made ingredients to intensify magnificent Italian emotions. As their name suggests, these essences are highly concentrated, powerful and vibrant, an expression of true exclusivity. The delicately sweet essence of MAGNIFYING VANILLA tantalises, with vanilla beans imported from Madagascar. To develop the fruit’s most complex and nuanced facets, it’s dried in the sun. Raw, leathery and sexy notes culminate in an addictive aroma, and Magnifying Vanilla ignites an irresistible attraction.

name: HERMES L'Ombre des Merveilles Eau de parfum - UNISEX
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
The intense radiance of a chiariscuro fragrance, both woody and oriental.The sensuality of tonka bean and incense emphasized by deep notes of black tea.Olfactory emotion: Spicy, DryMain raw materials: Tonka bean, Black tea, Incense

name: HERMES Eau des Merveilles Eau de toilette
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
An enchanting perfume, warm and sparkling.A fragrance composed of smooth, vanilla toned benzoin and ambergris woody notes, a wonderful stroll in the refreshing cool of wild orange trees.Olfactory emotion: Spicy, DryMain raw materials: Elemi, Benzoin, Bitter orange

name: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Collector's Edition EDP (Dress Me Wild)
description:
90ML Eau de Parfum
Libre Collector Edition is a new and limited perfume by Yves Saint Laurent in a collector's bottle for women and was released in 2020
The sexy, cool, and floral “dress me wild” edition opens with notes of lavender, mandarin, and neroli in the opening notes; in the heart are orange and jasmine flowers, while the base combines vanilla, tonka, and white musk.

name: Black Opium Shine On Yves Saint Laurent - Limited Edition
description:
90ML Eau de Parfum
Black Opium Shine On by Yves Saint Laurent is a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Black Opium Shine On was launched in 2019. Black Opium Shine On was created by Nathalie Lorson, Marie Salamagne, Olivier Cresp and Honorine Blanc. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Orange Blossom and Pear; middle notes are Coffee, Jasmine, Almond and Licorice; base notes are Vanilla, Patchouli, Cashmere Wood and Cedar.

name: Black Opium EDP Holiday Collector Bottle Edition
description:
90ML - Eau de Parfum
To celebrate the festive season, YSL Beauty offers a wild twist on a holiday classic: Black Opium, now dressed in NEW glittering limited edition pattern.
The NEW Black Opium collector houses the much-loved Black Opium original Eau de Parfum.
A captivating floral gourmand scent, twisted with an overdose of black coffee, for a shot of adrenaline. Energy, sensuality, coupled with that unique YSL edge.The signature black coffee accord is paired with creamy vanilla, enriched by the softness of white flowers and orange blossom, against a base of patchouli and comforting white musk, for a women’s fragrance that bewitches with its trail.
Crafted by Marie Salamagne, Nathalie Lorson, Olivier Cresp and Honorine Blanc.
• Top notes: pear accord, mandarin essence• Heart notes: vanilla, orange blossom, white flowers• Base notes: black coffee accord, cedarwood essence, white musk, patchouli

name: Nomade by CHLOE 75ml EDP
description:
75ML Eau de Parfum
Chloé Nomade Eau de Parfum encapsulates the spirit of a woman open to the beauty of the World, who flourishes through her experiences and encounters.
A perfume with an intense character of oak moss, shrouded in the sweetness of cherry plum and the freshness of freesia.

name: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet 50ML
TERRE D'HERMES EDT 50 ML by HERMES
description:
50ML Eau de Toilette
 Terre d'Hermes by Hermès is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. Terre d'Hermes was launched in 2006. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean-Claude Ellena. Top notes are Orange and Grapefruit; middle notes are Pepper and Pelargonium; base notes are Vetiver, Cedar, Patchouli and Benzoin. This perfume is the winner of award FiFi Award Fragrance Of The Year Men`s Luxe 2007.

name: Gucci Bloom Eau de Parfum 50ml
Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming by DIOR 100ML
description:
100ML Eau de Parfum
Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming by Dior is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Francois Demachy. Top notes are Raspberry, Black Currant, Pomegranate and Pink Pepper; middle notes are May Rose and Peony; base note is White Musk.

name: Davidoff Cool Water Eau de Toilette
description:
125ML Eau de Toilette
Davidoff Cool Water Eau de Toilette For Men is an original marine fragrance for men, inspired by the freshness of the ocean. Cool Water is the aromatic essence of masculine vitality, power and seduction. An invigorating scent delivers energy as well as audacity. With refreshing top notes of lavender coupled with peppermint, the perfume opens with vibrant and sparkling intensity. The heart notes of sandalwood, geranium together with oakmoss add body and presence to the fragrance. Deeper notes of musk and amber are the base notes that add more intensity as well as an interesting contrast.

name: Mon Paris Eau de Parfum 90ML by YVES SAINT LAURENT
description:
90ML Eau de Parfum
Capturing the spirit of an intense love affair, YSL introduces Mon Paris perfume - a new expression of love today, inspired by the city of lovers, Paris.
Mon Paris is a fragrance which urges you to seize the moment; transcend the present; and prepare to fall head over heels into the arms of a passionate love.
A subversive reinvention of the traditional chypre, the new floral perfume turns the traditional model upside down, by introducing a brave, bold narcotic white chypre fit for love today.

name: Red Wood DSQUARED2 For Women
description:
Eau de Toilette - 100ML
Red Wood by DSQUARED2 is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Red Wood was launched in 2019. Top notes are Cranberry and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Litchi, Magnolia and Rose; base notes are Cedar, Amberwood and Musk.

name: L'Eau D'Issey Pour Homme Issey Miyake
description:
Eau de Toilette - 125ML
L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme by Issey Miyake is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for men. L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme was launched in 1994. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier. Top notes are Yuzu, Lemon, Bergamot, Lemon Verbena, Mandarin Orange, Cypress, Calone, Coriander, Tarragon and Sage; middle notes are Blue Lotus, Nutmeg, Lily-of-the-Valley, Saffron, Ceylon Cinnamon, Bourbon Geranium and Mignonette; base notes are Tahitian Vetiver, Musk, Cedar, Sandalwood, Tobacco and Amber.

name: Acqua di Giò Absolu Giorgio Armani
description:
Eau de Parfum - 125ML
Acqua di Giò Absolu by Giorgio Armani is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Acqua di Giò Absolu was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Sea Notes, Bergamot, Pear, Grapefruit, Apple and Lemon; middle notes are Lavender, Geranium and Rosemary; base notes are Woody Notes, Tonka Bean, Patchouli, Amberwood and Labdanum.

name: Kenzo World EDP by KENZO
description:
Eau de Parfum - 75 ML
Kenzo World by Kenzo is a Floral fragrance for women. Kenzo World was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top note is Red Fruits; middle notes are Peony, Floral Notes and Egyptian Jasmine; base note is Ambroxan.

name: Ouverture Xerjoff Velvet Collection
description:
Eau de Parfum - 100ML
Ouverture by Xerjoff is a Amber Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ouverture was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice. Top notes are Fig Leaf, Orange and Magnolia; middle notes are Indian Jasmine, Bulgarian Rose, Cinnamon and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla, Cashmere Wood, Amber and Incense.

name: Metallique Tom Ford
description:
Eau de parfum - 100ML
Metallique by Tom Ford is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Metallique was launched in 2019. Top notes are Aldehydes, Pink Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Heliotrope, Hawthorn and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Vanilla, Ambrette (Musk Mallow), Peru Balsam and Sandalwood.

name: 212 VIP Rosé Red Carolina Herrera
description:
Eau de Parfum - 80ML
212 VIP Rosé Red by Carolina Herrera is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. 212 VIP Rosé Red was launched in 2020. Top notes are Liquor, Tomato and Raspberry; middle notes are Tiramisu, Spices and Bulgarian Rose; base notes are Patchouli, Musk and Woody Notes.

name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue EDT for Women
description:
Eau de Toilette - 100ML
Dolce &amp; Gabbana Light Blue perfume has combination of lively Sicilian citron and effervescent Granny Smith Apples, are softened and ethereally blended with the intensity of freesia, jasmine, earthy musk and amber
Dolce &amp; Gabbana Light Blue is a stunning fragrance that's both overwhelming and irresistible, like the joy of living

name: Wood for Her DSQUARED2
description:
Eau de Toilette - 100ML
Wood for Her by DSQUARED2 is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Wood for Her was launched in 2018. Top notes are Raspberry Leaf, Mandarin Orange, Magnolia and Lily-of-the-Valley; middle notes are Osmanthus and Jasmine; base notes are White Woods, Ambroxan and Cedar.

name: Noir Extreme Tom Ford (TESTER BOX)
description:
Eau de Parfum - 100ML (TESTER BOX)
Noir Extreme by Tom Ford is a Amber Woody fragrance for men. Noir Extreme was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Sonia Constant. Top notes are Cardamom, Nutmeg, Saffron, Mandarin Orange and Neroli; middle notes are Kulfi, Rose, Jasmine, Mastic or Lentisque and Orange Blossom; base notes are Vanilla, Amber, Woody Notes and Sandalwood.

name: Diptyque 34 L'Eau Du Trente-Quatre
description:
100ML Eau de Toilette
From the 34 Boulevard Satin-Germain collection celebrating diptyque's 50th anniversary, 34 L'Eau du Trent-Quatre Eau de Toilette captures the scent of the first boutique during spring, when the weather changes and the greenest notes take over the warmer and sensual notes.
Style: Green, woody, floral.
Notes: grapefruit, bitter orange, fig leaves, galbanum, Egyptian, geranium, tuberose, cinnamon, nutmeg, cedarwood, vetiver, white musk.

name: Good Girl Légère Carolina Herrera (TESTER BOX)
description:
80ML Eau de Parfum (Tester Box)
Good Girl Légère by Carolina Herrera is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Good Girl Légère was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Louise Turner. Top notes are Ylang-Ylang, Mandarin Orange, Lemon and Bergamot; middle notes are Jasmine, Tuberose, Orange Blossom and Bulgarian Rose; base notes are Dulce de leche, Tonka Bean, Praline, Cinnamon, Sandalwood, Cashmirwood, Amber, Musk, Patchouli and Cedar.
